# AVMusicUserEvent

**Class**

An object that represents a custom user message.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMusicUserEvent
```

## Overview

When playback of an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicTrack] reaches this event, the system calls the track’s callback. You can’t modify the size and contents of an [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicUserEvent] once you create it.

## Creating a User Event

- **init(data:)**: Creates a user event with the data you specify.

## Inspecting a User Event

- **sizeInBytes**: The size of the data that the user event represents.

## Handling Music Events

- **AVMusicEvent**: A base class for the events you associate with a music track.
- **AVParameterEvent**: An object that represents a parameter event on a music track’s destination.
- **AVAUPresetEvent**: An object that represents a preset load and change on the music track’s destination audio unit.
- **AVExtendedTempoEvent**: An object that represents a tempo change to a specific beats-per-minute value.
- **AVExtendedNoteOnEvent**: An object that represents a custom extension of a MIDI note on event.

## Inherits From

- AVMusicEvent

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
